episodes.title: 152: The Toronto Blessing Part 1
episodes.description: This week, we start our look into the prophecy and miracle filled saga known as The Toronto Blessing. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 151: Kansas City Prophets Part II W/ Jay from Your Music Saved Us
episodes.description:
This week we finish up the tale of the Kansas City Prophets and the madness that led to the Toronto Blessing. We are also joined by Jay from Your Music Saved Us as he tells us his stories of being at IHOPKC.

episodes.title: 150: Kansas City Prophets Part I feat. Jay from 'Your Music Saved Us'
episodes.description: This week, we're joined by Jay from 'Your Music Saved Us' as we discuss the origins of The Kansas City Prophets. From Bob Jones' (not that one) wild prophecies to Mike Bickle making his name, it's a crazy start. www.excompod.com
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.description: This week we finish up the tale of the Kansas City Prophets and the madness that led to the Toronto Blessing. We are also joined by Jay from Your Music Saved Us as he tells us his stories of being at IHOPKC. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 149: Kenneth Hagin Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our 2 part series on the vision-seeing madman.

episodes.title: 148: Kenneth Hagin Part I
episodes.description: This week, we start our journey into the giddy powerhouse known as Kenneth Hagin.

episodes.title: 147: The Beliefs Of The NAR w/Scott Okamoto
episodes.description: This week, we are joined by Scott Okamoto (author of Asian Apostate), to talk about the origins of the New Apostolic Reformation.

episodes.title: 146: Kathryn Kuhlman Part III
episodes.description: Chaz is solo today but we finish up the series on Kathryn Kuhlman and her insane life as a grifter and "miracle" worker.

episodes.title: 145: Kathryn Kuhlman Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue our series on The Miracle Lady. From her starting a church in a roller rink, to leading 4 hour services at Carnegie Hall and healing cancer.

episodes.title: 144: Kathryn Kuhlman Part I
episodes.description: This week we start our series on the Miracle Lady herself. Find out how Kuhlman walked, so all other televangelists could run. Look out for Mister! www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 143: A.A. Allen Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our series on the the tiny but mighty, A.A. Allen. We discuss his final years, his death and a dangerous cult that was influenced by the man. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 142: A.A. Allen Part I
episodes.description: This week we continue our look into the madness that is Faith Healers! We bring you the origin of A.A. Allen! From his early days as a drunk toddler, to the flat out denial that his healing claims would actually work, this one JUST MIGHT end in a cult. Again. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 141: Oarl Roberts Part IV
episodes.description: This week, we conclude our series in Oral Roberts. We discuss the paths his children took, the types of grifts he ran to get his hospitals and the death and impact of the titan of Faith Healing.

episodes.title: 140: Oral Roberts Part III
episodes.description: We journey further into the life of the grifter and his rise to power in Tulsa, his way of making a quick exit and fulfilling his father's prophecies.

episodes.title: 139: Oral Roberts Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue our tale of Oral Roberts, godfather of Prosperity Gospel and one of America's greatest grifters.

episodes.title: 138: Oral Roberts Part I
episodes.description: This week we start our deep dive into the godfather of Prosperity Gospel. From his early life with a curse of a brother, to his battle with tuberculosis and finding the Lord. Do some stretches, we got more Oral than you can handle.

episodes.title: 137: William Branham Part IV: The Final Chapter
episodes.description: This week we conclude our series on Branham. We talk his final years, his death and the different cults and other ways he left The Message behind.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 136: William Branham Part III
episodes.description: Sorry fo the late release! We bring you the third part in our deep dive on the faith healer turned cult leader. From his time with Jim Jones to his crazy stories to convince his congregation he's the second coming of Christ.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 135: William Branham Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue the story of the Faith Healer/Cult Leader. We cover more of the monsters he influenced, the lengths he went to convince his congregation and introduce a heavy hitter he toured with.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 134: William Branham Part I
episodes.description: This week, we dive into the life of one Christianity's biggest faith healers. We discuss his early life (and his tall tales), beginnings of his faith and the start of his Ministry/Cult.

episodes.title: 129: Mother Teresa: Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our series on Mother Teresa, as we discuss her criminal connections, the money and the effect of her "work" on society.   www.excompod.com  For all our links and merch! Theme by Iron Chic

episodes.title: 128: Mother Teresa: Part 1: Mama Mia
episodes.description: This week, Chrissy leads us on a journey through the early life of The saint Of The Gutters herself; Mother Teresa. Plus a little update on our pal Josh Harris.  www.excompod.com for all our links and merch! Please leave a review!

episodes.title: 69. Pat Robertson V
episodes.description: We finish up our series on Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 68. Pat Robertson Part IV
episodes.description: We keep going deeper and deeper into Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 67. Pat Robertson Part III
episodes.description: We dive further into Pat Robertson and his terrible and horrible existence.

episodes.title: 66. Pat Robertson Part II
episodes.description: We dive back into the life of Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 65. Pat Robertson: Part I
episodes.description: This week, we start our deep dive into the almighty, Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 25. Interview With Brent Detwiler: Covenant/SGM's Fall And Sexual Abuse Coverup.
episodes.description: This week I interview Brent Detwiler, who was a founding member of Covenant Life/SGM. We talk about this history of the church, his relationship with CJ Mahaney, the child sexual abuse cover and the roll that Joshua Harris played in it all.
